title: Vlkodlačí hněv (svitek)
content:
Vlkodlačí hněv

Notes contain the formula for a potion made with werewolf fur. The potion unlocks the ability to acquire a Dexterity upgrade when consumed.

Notes containing the formula for a potion made with Srst vlkodlaka. This potion can only be brewed if Geralt chooses to kill Vincent Meis while he is a vlkodlak. If he breaks the curse, he cannot obtain the primary ingredient, his fur.

Zápisy do Deníku

Receptury: Vlkodlačí hněv

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
600  	120  




Lokace
tělo Rolanda Bleinheima po úkolu Diplomacie a lov
Poustevník
